description: water bubbles are an innovative and eco-friendly alternative to plastic water bottles. Made from a biodegradable and edible seaweed-based membrane, these water capsules provide a sustainable way to stay hydrated without contributing to plastic waste.
astuce: The bubbles can be consumed whole or punctured to drink the water inside, making them ideal for events, marathons, and on-the-go hydration.

description: Watermelon-flavored Ooho water bubbles offer a refreshing and eco-friendly way to stay hydrated while enjoying a burst of fruity taste. Made from a biodegradable and edible seaweed-based membrane, these innovative water capsules provide a sustainable alternative to plastic bottles.
astuce: With their natural watermelon essence, they deliver a sweet and juicy flavor, making them perfect for sports events, outdoor activities, or simply as a fun way to drink water.

description: Orange-flavored Ooho water bubbles offer a zesty and eco-conscious way to hydrate while enjoying a burst of citrusy freshness. Encased in a biodegradable and edible seaweed-based membrane, these water capsules provide an innovative alternative to traditional plastic bottles
astuce: Infused with the vibrant taste of orange, they deliver a tangy and refreshing drink that’s perfect for on-the-go hydration, sports events, or outdoor adventures.
